name: Ultimate Bus Driver Pro
description:
Enjoy the Bus Driving app and Environment around the city!

Take people from a city to another, show them amazing places and landscapes. Open world map, incredible vehicles, wonderful interiors will make you feel a realistic coach bus driving experience! It's time to get on board and drive!

Get ready to be a public transporter bus driver many passengers will be waiting for you at bus stations and you have to carry them to their destinations. Finishing missions unlocks other Buses and vehicles that allow you to enjoy different game modes so improve you’re driving skills and make sure to get your passengers on time.

Get Ultimate Bus Driver Pro now from App Store!
